Text: Partial Requirements Pooling Latrobe Steelattached file reflects necessary criteria for the customer to participate in this program Please refer to the Nomination Procedure section it indicates which contracts should be used as well as the required fields Please note that both the pool operator and the direct or its agent must enter corresponding nominations Please feel free to contact me at if you have any questions See attached file Partialpoolingdoc Partialpoolingdoc
